analyzed: log par ltung ba med pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One who is not subject to falling back” — one should not abide in that way, by way of apprehending something.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ste 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar dbyung ngo zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba ste 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar dbyung ngo zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One who returns once” — one should not abide in that way, by way of apprehending something, thinking, “Having returned once to this world, one will put an end to suffering.”

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One who has entered to actualize the fruit of non-return” — one should not abide in that way, by way of apprehending something.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba ste de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba ste de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will become a non-returner, and attain final nirvāṇa right here,”

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will enter into the result of an arhat,”

original: dgra bcom pa ste tshe 'di nyid la phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa ste tshe 'di nyid la phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will attain final nirvāṇa in this very life, in the element of nirvāṇa without any aggregates remaining,”

original: rang sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will become a pratyekabuddha,”

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
translated: “I will transcend the level of the śrāvakas and the level of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: and abide in the bodhisattva levels,”

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa @464a *//
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa @464a *//
translated: “I will know the aspects of the path,”

original: nyid kyi ye shes dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi ye shes dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the gnosis of one’s own self, nor in the gnosis of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the thought, ‘Having fully awakened to all phenomena in all their aspects, I will eliminate all the afflictive emotions along with their habitual tendencies.’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the thought, ‘Having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, I will turn the wheel of the Dharma.’

original: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te /
translated: “One should not abide in the thought, ‘Having done the work of a buddha,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med par song ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med par song ste /
translated: having gone to countless, limitless world systems,

original: sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: I will lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa.’

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te /
translated: “He should not stand in the notion that ‘I, standing in the four bases of supernormal power,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bya ma snyed du gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bya ma snyed du gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: should enter into the trances and go to the end of the world systems in the eastern direction, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, by means of supernormal power.’

original: bdag gi tshe ni tshad med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gi tshe ni tshad med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “He should not stand in the notion that ‘I should live for an immeasurable lifespan.’

original: bdag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis las mtshan re re zhing yang bsod nams brgyas yongs su grub par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis las mtshan re re zhing yang bsod nams brgyas yongs su grub par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “He should not stand in the notion that ‘I should attain each of the thirty-two marks of a superman by means of a hundred merits.’

original: shar phyogs kyi @464b 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi @464b 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang /
translated: the east, the south, the west,

original: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang /
translated: the north, the northeast, the southeast, the southwest, and the northwest,🔽and the zenith and the nadir.

original: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa de tsam gyi tha grur bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig bsgrub bo zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rgya ci tsam yod pa de tsam gyi tha grur bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig bsgrub bo zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will purify a buddhafield as vast as all the worlds in all the directions, as many worlds as there are sand particles in the Ganges River in the eastern direction, and as many worlds as there are sand particles in the Ganges River in the southern direction, and the western direction, and the northern direction, and the northeastern direction, and the southeastern direction, and the southwestern direction, and the northwestern direction, and the direction below, and the direction above.”

original: bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyu las grub par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyu las grub par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I will make the ground of the trichiliocosm to be made of diamond.”

original: bdag gis byang chub kyi shing las dri sems can gang gis tshor ba'ang rung ste /
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub kyi shing las dri sems can gang gis tshor ba'ang rung ste /
translated: “I will make the tree of awakening to be so high that sentient beings who smell its fragrance

original: de dag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnod pa med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽nyan thos kyis sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par ma gyur @465a *//
analyzed: de dag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnod pa med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // nyan thos kyis sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par ma gyur @465a *//
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘May they be free from the harm of desire, anger, and ignorance.’

original: cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘May they not arouse the mind of the śrāvakas or the mind of the pratyekabuddhas.’

original: de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘May all of them be destined for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: sems can gang gis byang chub kyi shing gi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi lus sam sems la nad gang yang med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gang gis byang chub kyi shing gi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi lus sam sems la nad gang yang med par gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that ‘May any being who smells the scent of that tree have no illness in their body or mind.’

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzugs kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽tshor ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzugs kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // tshor ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “I should not stand in the notion that the sound of form will exist there,🔽the sound of feeling will exist there,

original: 'du shes kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of perception will exist there,

original: 'du byed kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of volitional factors will exist there,

original: rnam par shes pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: the sound of consciousness will exist there.

original: khams kyi sgra dang / skye mched kyi sgra dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: khams kyi sgra dang / skye mched kyi sgra dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “I should not stand in the notion that the sound of the constituents will exist there, the sound of the sense fields will exist there, the sound of dependent origination will exist there.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “I should not stand in the notion that the sound of the perfection of giving will exist there,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of the perfection of morality will exist there,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of the perfection of patience will exist there,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: May the sound of the perfection of perseverance not exist!

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs @465b pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs @465b pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: May the sound of the perfection of meditative stabilization not exist!🔽May the sound of the perfection of wisdom not exist!

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “ One should not stand in a way that apprehends in terms of the notion that the sound of inner emptiness does not exist,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi sgra yong bar ma gyur cig /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi sgra yong bar ma gyur cig / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: the sound of outer emptiness does not exist,🔽or the sound of inner and outer emptiness does not exist.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “ One should not stand in a way that apprehends in terms of the notion that the sound of the emptiness of emptiness does not exist,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of the emptiness of great extent does not exist,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of the emptiness of ultimate reality does not exist,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: the sound of the emptiness of the conditioned does not exist,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena not exist!’

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena not exist!’🔽“It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes not exist!’🔽“It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of no beginning and no end not exist!’

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of nonrejection not exist!’

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of a basic nature not exist!’

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of all things not exist!’🔽“It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of specific characteristics not exist!’🔽“It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of nonapprehension not exist!’

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “It should not be seen in such a way that one thinks, ‘May the sound of the emptiness of an intrinsic nature not exist!’

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the emptiness of non-apprehension not exist!🔽“May the sound of the emptiness of essential nature not exist!

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi sgra yod @466a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi sgra yod @466a *//
translated: “May the sound of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension not exist!”

original: par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the applications of mindfulness not exist!

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the right efforts not exist!🔽“May the sound of the legs of supernormal power not exist!

original: dbang po rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “May the sound of the faculties not exist!

original: stobs rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the powers not exist!

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the limbs of awakening not exist!

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the sound of the noble eightfold path not exist!

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the noble truths should not exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the concentrations should not exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the immeasurables should not exist.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the formless absorptions should not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the liberations should not exist.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the gateways to liberation—namely, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness—should not exist.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the clairvoyances should not exist.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “One should not abide with a view toward the notion that the words of the meditative stabilities should not exist.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of the dhāraṇī gateways should not exist.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sgra @466b yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sgra @466b yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of the powers of the tathāgatas should not exist.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of the fearlessnesses should not exist.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽byams pa chen po'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // byams pa chen po'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of the detailed and thorough knowledges should not exist.🔽It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of great love should not exist.

original: snying rje chen po'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of great compassion should not exist.🔽It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of the distinct attributes of a buddha should not exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of stream enterers should not exist.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of once-returners should not exist.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: It should not be based on the idea that the sounds of non-returners should not exist.

original: dgra bcom pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “May the word ‘worthy one’ not exist!”

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the word ‘solitary buddha’ not exist!”

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra yod par ma gyur cig /
translated: “May the word ‘bodhisattva’ not exist!”

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgra yod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o ////
translated: “May the word ‘buddha’ not exist!”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya gcig pa //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
analyzed: bam po brgya gcig pa // de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
translated: One Hundred and First

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang chos thams cad ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: If you ask why, it is because the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas, having attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, do not apprehend any phenomena at all.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o //🔽de nas @467a *//🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di snyam du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o // de nas @467a *// tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di snyam du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should not stand in the perfection of wisdom by way of taking it as a basis.🔽Then venerable Śāriputra thought, “How should bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la smras pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la smras pa /
translated: Then venerable Subhūti, having understood in his mind the thoughts occurring to venerable Śāriputra, said to venerable Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas /
translated: In what do the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas stand?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la'ang gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la'ang gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The Tathāgata does not stand anywhere.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni mi gnas pa ste /
translated: the mind of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, does not stand anywhere.

original: de gzugs la mi gnas /
analyzed: de gzugs la mi gnas /
translated: It does not stand in form,

original: tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in feeling,

original: 'du shes la mi gnas /
analyzed: 'du shes la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in perception,

original: 'du byed la mi gnas /
analyzed: 'du byed la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa la mi gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la mi gnas so //
translated: and does not stand in consciousness.

original: mig la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig la mi gnas /
translated: It does not stand in the eyes,

original: rna ba la mi gnas /🔽sna la mi gnas /
analyzed: rna ba la mi gnas / sna la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in the ears,🔽does not stand in the nose,

original: lce la mi gnas /
analyzed: lce la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in the tongue,

original: lus la mi gnas /
analyzed: lus la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in the body,

original: yid la mi gnas so //
analyzed: yid la mi gnas so //
translated: and does not stand in the thinking mind.

original: gzugs la mi gnas /
analyzed: gzugs la mi gnas /
translated: It does not stand in a form,

original: sgra la mi gnas /🔽dri la mi gnas /🔽ro la mi gnas /
analyzed: sgra la mi gnas / dri la mi gnas / ro la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in a sound,🔽does not stand in a smell,🔽does not stand in a taste,

original: reg la mi gnas /
analyzed: reg la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in a feeling,

original: chos la mi gnas so /
analyzed: chos la mi gnas so /
translated: and does not stand in a dharma.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: It does not stand in eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in ear consciousness,🔽does not stand in nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam @467b par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam @467b par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: does not stand in body consciousness,🔽and

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas so //
translated: He does not stand in the mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of eye, visible forms, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of ear, sounds, and consciousness.🔽He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of nose, smells, and consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of tongue, tastes, and consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of body, touchables, and consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas //
translated: He does not stand in the contact that is the coming together of thinking-mind, thoughts, and consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of eye, visible forms, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of ear, sounds, and consciousness.🔽He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of nose, smells, and consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of tongue, tastes, and consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of body, touchables, and consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is the coming together of thinking-mind, thoughts, and consciousness.

original: sa'i khams la mi gnas /
analyzed: sa'i khams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la mi gnas /
analyzed: chu'i khams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the water element.

original: me'i khams la mi gnas /
analyzed: me'i khams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams la mi gnas /
analyzed: rlung gi khams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the space element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas //
translated: nor in the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: ma rig pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in ignorance,

original: 'du byed la mi gnas /
analyzed: 'du byed la mi gnas /
translated: in volitional impulses,

original: rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: in consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs la mi gnas /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la mi gnas /
translated: in name-and-form,

original: skye mched drug la mi gnas /
analyzed: skye mched drug la mi gnas /
translated: in the six sense fields,

original: reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: in contact,

original: tshor ba la mi gnas /🔽sred pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: tshor ba la mi gnas / sred pa la mi gnas /
translated: in feeling,🔽in craving,

original: len pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: len pa la mi gnas /
translated: in clinging,

original: srid pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: srid pa la mi gnas /
translated: in existence,

original: skye ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: skye ba la mi gnas /
translated: in birth,

original: rga shi la mi gnas so //
analyzed: rga shi la mi gnas so //
translated: or in old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
translated: in the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
translated: in the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @468a *//🔽phyin pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu @468a *// phyin pa la mi gnas /
translated: in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas /
translated: in the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so //🔽nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so // nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: or in the perfection of wisdom.🔽He does not stand in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: in outer emptiness,🔽or in both inner and outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in ultimate emptiness,🔽they do not stand in conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi gnas / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in unconditioned emptiness,🔽they do not stand in the emptiness of what is beyond limits,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of non-rejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of a basic nature,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of its own mark,🔽they do not stand in the emptiness of not being apprehended,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi gnas / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of a non-existent thing,🔽they do not stand in the emptiness of an essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas so //
translated: they do not stand in the emptiness of an essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: He does not stand in the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas /🔽dbang po rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas / dbang po rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the legs of miraculous power,🔽he does not stand in the faculties,

original: stobs rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: stobs rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas so //
translated: he does not stand in the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the meditative stabilizations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the immeasurables,

original: @468b gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: @468b gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi gnas /
translated: he does not stand in the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas //
translated: they do not stand in the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the tathāgata powers,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi gnas /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi gnas /
translated: they do not stand in the fearlessnesses,

analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /

translated: nor does he not stand in them.

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor does he not stand in them.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @471b med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma @471b med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of the sphere of phenomena, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the unlimited, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of that which has neither been examined nor analyzed, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of nature, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of all things, nor does he not stand in it.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the nonapprehension of things, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of a nonexistent thing, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of an existent thing, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of essential nature, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin / mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of nonapprehension, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of nonapprehension, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of essential nature, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of nonexistence, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin / mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of existence, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of nature, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of nonproduction, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of production, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽byams pa chen po la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / byams pa chen po la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of noncessation, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /🔽snying rje chen po la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of cessation, nor does he not stand in it.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of the own-nature of peace, nor does he not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: He does not stand in

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor do they not stand in them.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor do they not stand in it.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: nor do they not stand in it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They do not stand in the knowledge of all modes,🔽nor do they not stand in it.

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste /
translated: They should stand in the perfection of wisdom like that.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom like that, without apprehending anything.

original: gnas par bya'o //🔽de nas 'khor de'i nang nas /
analyzed: gnas par bya'o // de nas 'khor de'i nang nas /
translated: They should stand in it.

original: lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du @472a *//🔽sems par gyur te /
analyzed: lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du @472a *//🔽sems par gyur te /
translated: Then some sons of gods in the assembly thought,🔽“These sons of gods have not heard the perfection of wisdom explained, have not been taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom, and have not trained in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi brjod pa de dag ni smras par gyur na shes par rung gi /
analyzed: gang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi brjod pa de dag ni smras par gyur na shes par rung gi /
translated: “The words of the yakṣas, the language of the yakṣas, the sounds of the yakṣas, the expressions of the yakṣas, which are harmful, are suitable to be known when they are spoken.

original: gang 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang / gtan la phab par ston pa de ni shes par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gang 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang / gtan la phab par ston pa de ni shes par mi rung ngo //
translated: But the words, the expressions, the teachings, the analyses, the clarifications, and the expositions of the noble Subhūti on the perfection of wisdom are not suitable to be known.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti,

original: lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
translated: having understood in his mind the thoughts occurring to those gods,

original: lha'i bu de dag la smras pa /
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag la smras pa /
translated: said to those gods,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /

analyzed: gang smras pa de shes par mi rung ngam /

original: lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa /
analyzed: lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: The gods said,

original: 'phags pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'phags pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Noble Subhūti,

original: shes par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: shes par mi rung ngo //
translated: they are not suitable to be known.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: “Gods,

analyzed: lha'i bu / de dag ni 'di ltar yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod kyi /
translated: “Divine princes, it is like this: not a single syllable is uttered here.

original: gang ma brjod pa de ni thos par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gang ma brjod pa de ni thos par mi rung ngo //
translated: What is not uttered is not heard.

original: gang thos par mi rung ba de ni shes par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gang thos par mi rung ba de ni shes par mi rung ngo //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma yin te /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not a syllable.

original: de la su'ang ston pa dang / mnyan pa dang / shes par byed pa med do //
analyzed: de la su'ang ston pa dang / mnyan pa dang / shes par byed pa med do //
translated: There is no one here who teaches, listens, or understands.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa'o //
translated: the enlightenment of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas is without syllables.

original: lha'i bu dag /

translated: Divine princes,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa @472b zhig sprul te /
translated: for example, a tathāgata, arhat, perfectly enlightened buddha emanates a buddha emanation.

original: sprul pa des kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi mngon par sprul pa /
analyzed: sprul pa des kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi mngon par sprul pa /

analyzed: de nas sprul pa des sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos bstan par gyur na / lha'i bu dag /
translated: Then the emanation taught the Dharma to those four emanated assemblies of disciples.

original: de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: 'khor der sus kyang bstan par gyur pa'am /

analyzed: sus kyang thos pa med do //

original: sus kyang shes pa med do //
analyzed: sus kyang shes pa med do //

original: lha'i bu dag /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig chos ston par mthong na / lha'i bu dag /

original: de ni med do //

analyzed: des sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi la chos bstan na /

analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems /

original: de la sus kyang bstan pa 'am /
analyzed: de la sus kyang bstan pa 'am /
translated: has anyone taught this to anyone,

original: thos pa 'am /
analyzed: thos pa 'am /
translated: or has anyone heard it,

original: shes par gyur pa yod dam /
analyzed: shes par gyur pa yod dam /
translated: or understood it?”

original: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: de ni med do //
analyzed: de ni med do //
translated: it has not.”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: all phenomena are like an illusion,

original: de la sus kyang bstan pa med do //
analyzed: de la sus kyang bstan pa med do //
translated: and no one has taught this to anyone.

original: sus kyang thos pa med do //
analyzed: sus kyang thos pa med do //
translated: No one has heard it,

original: sus kyang shes pa med do //
analyzed: sus kyang shes pa med do //
translated: and no one has understood it.”

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /🔽kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa @473b ste /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te / kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa @473b ste /
translated: Then the thought occurred to those divine princes,🔽“Ah! The elder Subhūti is illuminating this.

original: kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal bar byed kyang /🔽zab pa bas kyang shin tu zab pa ston /
analyzed: kye ma 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal bar byed kyang / zab pa bas kyang shin tu zab pa ston /
translated: Ah! The noble Subhūti is illuminating the perfection of wisdom,🔽teaching what is more profound than the profound,

original: phra ba bas kyang shin tu phra ba ston pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: phra ba bas kyang shin tu phra ba ston pa la 'jug go /
translated: and teaching what is more subtle than the subtle.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti

original: lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes te /
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes te /
translated: He knew the thoughts that were in the minds of those gods,

analyzed: lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: and he said to them,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Gods,

analyzed: gzugs ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of eye is not deep or subtle.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of ear is not deep or subtle.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of nose is not deep or subtle.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra @475a *//🔽ba ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra @475a *// ba ma yin /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of tongue is not deep or subtle.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of body is not deep or subtle.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact that is a coming together of mind is not deep or subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact initiated by the eyes is neither deep nor subtle.🔽The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact initiated by the ears is neither deep nor subtle.🔽The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact initiated by the nose is neither deep nor subtle.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact initiated by the tongue is neither deep nor subtle.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the sensory experience that arises from contact initiated by the body is neither deep nor subtle.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // sa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

analyzed: chu'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

analyzed: me'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / rlung gi khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //

original: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of ignorance is not profound and not subtle.

original: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of volitional factors is not profound and not subtle.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of consciousness is not profound and not subtle.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of name-and-form is not deep or subtle.

original: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the six sense sources is not deep or subtle.

original: reg pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of contact is not deep or subtle.

original: tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽sred pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // sred pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of feeling is not deep or subtle.🔽The nature of craving is not deep or subtle.

original: len pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: len pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of grasping is not deep or subtle.

original: srid pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽skye ba'i @476a *//
analyzed: srid pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // skye ba'i @476a *//
translated: The nature of existence is not deep or subtle.

original: rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of birth is not deep or subtle.

original: rga shi'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rga shi'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of old age and death is not deep or subtle.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not deep or subtle.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is not deep or subtle.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of patience is not profound and not subtle.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is not profound and not subtle.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of concentration is not profound and not subtle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not profound and not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the perfection of giving is not profound and not subtle.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the perfection of morality is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of the perfection of patience is not profound and not subtle.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the perfection of perseverance is not profound and not subtle.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the perfection of meditative stability is neither profound nor subtle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The nature of the perfection of wisdom is neither profound nor subtle.🔽Inner emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: Outer emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: Great emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid @476b ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid @476b ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is neither profound nor subtle.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is neither profound nor subtle.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is neither profound nor subtle.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: “The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is neither profound nor subtle.🔽“The emptiness of non-rejection is neither profound nor subtle.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: “The emptiness of inherent existence is neither profound nor subtle.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: “The emptiness of all phenomena is neither profound nor subtle.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: “The emptiness of defining attributes is neither profound nor subtle.🔽“The emptiness of non-apprehension is neither profound nor subtle.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: “The emptiness of non-entities is neither profound nor subtle.🔽“The emptiness of essential nature is neither profound nor subtle.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: “The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is neither profound nor subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: “And why is that?

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: “The nature of inner emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of external emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of internal and external emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of great emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of ultimate emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of conditioned emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of unconditioned emptiness is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of nature is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of all phenomena is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of specific characteristics is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is internal is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is external is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is internal and external is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the unlimited is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of non-dispersal is neither profound nor subtle.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin @477a *//🔽phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin @477a *// phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of all phenomena is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of specific characteristics is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is internal is neither profound nor subtle.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is external is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of what is internal and external is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of the unlimited is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of non-dispersal is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is neither profound nor subtle.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of something in something else is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
