analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not profound and not subtle.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is neither profound nor subtle.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are neither profound nor subtle.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The right efforts are neither profound nor subtle.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /🔽dbang po rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin / dbang po rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The legs of manifestation are neither profound nor subtle.🔽The faculties are neither profound nor subtle.

original: stobs rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: stobs rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The powers are neither profound nor subtle.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The branches of enlightenment are neither profound nor subtle.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The noble eightfold path is neither profound nor subtle.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin @477b phra ba ma yin /🔽bsam gtan rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin @477b phra ba ma yin / bsam gtan rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The noble truths are neither profound nor subtle.🔽The meditative stabilities are neither profound nor subtle.

original: chad med pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: chad med pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The liberations are neither profound nor subtle.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The formless absorptions are not profound and not subtle.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The aspects of liberation are not profound and not subtle.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The serial absorptions are not profound and not subtle.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are not profound and not subtle.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The higher cognitions are not profound and not subtle.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are not profound and not subtle.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not profound and not subtle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not profound and not subtle.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The fearlessnesses are not profound and not subtle.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are not profound and not subtle.

original: byams pa chen po ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: Great love is not profound or subtle.

original: snying rje chen po ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin /
translated: Great compassion is not profound or subtle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha are not profound or subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the applications of mindfulness is not profound or subtle.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽dbang po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // dbang po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the right efforts is not profound or subtle.🔽The nature of the bases of spiritual power is not profound or subtle.🔽The nature of the faculties is not profound or subtle.

original: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the powers is not profound or subtle.

original: @478a *// byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: @478a *// byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the branches of enlightenment is not profound or subtle.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the noble eightfold path is neither profound nor subtle.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the four noble truths is neither profound nor subtle.

original: bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽tshad med pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // tshad med pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the meditative concentrations is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the immeasurable aspirations is neither profound nor subtle.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the formless absorptions is neither profound nor subtle.

original: rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the liberations is neither profound nor subtle.🔽The nature of the aspects of liberation is neither profound nor subtle.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness is neither profound nor subtle.

original: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the superknowledges is not profound and not subtle.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the meditative stabilizations is not profound and not subtle.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the dhāraṇī gateways is not profound and not subtle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the powers of the tathāgatas is not profound and not subtle.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the fearlessnesses is not profound and not subtle.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //🔽byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no // byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the detailed and thorough knowledges is not profound and not subtle.🔽The nature of great love is not profound and not subtle.

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba @478b ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba @478b ma yin no //
translated: The nature of great compassion is not profound and not subtle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not profound and not subtle.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the knowledge of all aspects is not profound and not subtle.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is not profound,

original: phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phra ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not subtle.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not profound, it is not subtle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the knowledge of all aspects is not profound, it is not subtle.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the knowledge of paths is not profound, it is not subtle.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the knowledge of all aspects is not profound, it is not subtle.

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
translated: Then it occurred to those gods to think,

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
translated: “In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of form,

original: tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of feeling,

original: 'du shes su btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of perception,

original: 'du byed du btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed du btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of consciousness,

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig tu btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig tu btags pa med do //
translated: in this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the eyes,

original: rna bar btags pa med do //🔽snar btags pa med do //
analyzed: rna bar btags pa med do // snar btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the ear.🔽There is no designation of the nose.

original: lcer btags pa med do //
analyzed: lcer btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the tongue.

original: lus su btags pa med do //
analyzed: lus su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the body.

original: yid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: yid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the mind.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni gzugs su btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of form.

original: sgrar btags pa med do //🔽drir btags pa med do //
analyzed: sgrar btags pa med do // drir btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of sound.🔽There is no designation of smell.

original: ror btags pa med do //🔽reg tu btags pa med do //
analyzed: ror btags pa med do // reg tu btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of taste.🔽There is no designation of texture.

original: chos su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of mental phenomena.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par btags pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes par btags @479a *//🔽pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par btags pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes par btags @479a *// pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the ear consciousness.🔽There is no designation of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the mind consciousness.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensory contact of the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensory contact of the tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensory contact of the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par btags pa med do //
translated: and there is no designation of the sensory contact of the mind.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the eye,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the ear,🔽there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the nose,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the tongue,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: and there is no designation of the sensation that arises from the condition of the sensory contact of the mind.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sa'i khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sa'i khams su btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the earth element,

original: chu'i khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the water element,

original: me'i khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the fire element,🔽and there is no designation of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the element of wind,

original: nam mkha'i khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the element of space,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams su btags pa med do //
translated: and no designation of the element of consciousness.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni ma rig par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni ma rig par btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of ignorance,

original: 'du byed du btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes @479b par btags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes @479b par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs su btags pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of name and form,

original: skye mched drug tu btags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug tu btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the six sense sources,

original: reg par btags pa med do //
analyzed: reg par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of contact,

original: tshor bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor bar btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of feeling,

original: sred par btags pa med do; ;len par btags pa med do //
analyzed: sred par btags pa med do; ;len par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of craving, no designation of clinging,

original: srid par btags pa med do //
analyzed: srid par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of existence,

original: skye bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: skye bar btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of birth,

original: rga shir btags pa med do //
analyzed: rga shir btags pa med do //
translated: and no designation of old age and death.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the perfection of conduct,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the perfection of patience,🔽and

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par btags pa med do //
translated: and no designation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of ultimate emptiness,🔽no designation of conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du btags pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of unconditioned emptiness,🔽no designation of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things,🔽no designation of the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽no designation of the emptiness of all things,🔽no designation of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽no designation of the emptiness of nonobservation,🔽no designation of the emptiness of the nonexistence of things,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: no designation of the emptiness of essential nature,🔽and no designation of the emptiness of other.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //🔽rang gi mtshan @480a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du btags pa med do // rang gi mtshan @480a *//
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of its own mark.🔽There is no designation of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: In this teaching of the Dharma, there is no designation of the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams su btags pa med do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su btags pa med do //🔽dbang po rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams su btags pa med do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su btags pa med do // dbang po rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the right efforts.🔽There is no designation of the bases of supernatural power.🔽There is no designation of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the branches of enlightenment;

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the noble eightfold path;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the noble truths;

original: bsam gtan rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the meditative concentrations;

original: tshad med pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the immeasurables;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the formless absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the liberations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the serial absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par btags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the higher knowledges;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the meditative stabilizations;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su @480b btags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su @480b btags pa med do //
translated: they are not imputed as the powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su btags pa med do //🔽byams pa chen por btags pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su btags pa med do // byams pa chen por btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽there is no designation of the great love,

original: snying rje chen por btags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen por btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: chos bstan pa 'di la ni rgyun du zhugs par btags pa med do //
analyzed: chos bstan pa 'di la ni rgyun du zhugs par btags pa med do //
translated: in this teaching of the Dharma there is no designation of stream enterer,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of once-returner,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa med do //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong bar btags pa med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of non-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa med do //🔽dgra bcom par btags pa med do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur btags pa med do // dgra bcom par btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the result of non-returner,🔽there is no designation of worthy one,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid du btags pa med do //🔽rang sangs rgyas su btags pa med do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid du btags pa med do // rang sangs rgyas su btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of the state of a worthy one,🔽there is no designation of pratyekabuddha,

original: rang byang chub tu btags pa med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub tu btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpar btags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpar btags pa med do //
translated: there is no designation of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su btags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of the bodhisattva stages.

original: sangs rgyas su btags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of a buddha.

original: byang chub tu btags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub tu btags pa med do //
translated: There is no designation of awakening.🔽There is no designation of letters.”

original: yi ge rnams su btags pa med do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: yi ge rnams su btags pa med do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti addressed those gods as follows:

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Divine princes!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ni brjod du med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ni brjod du med do //
translated: The awakening of the tathāgatas is inexpressible.

original: smrar med do //
analyzed: smrar med do //
translated: It is beyond expression.

original: de ni sus kyang bstan pa med do //
analyzed: de ni sus kyang bstan pa med do //
translated: It has not been taught by anyone.

original: sus kyang thos pa med do //
analyzed: sus kyang thos pa med do //
translated: It has not been heard by anyone.

original: sus kyang shes pa med do //
analyzed: sus kyang shes pa med do //
translated: It has not been understood by anyone.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes!

original: de lta bas na la la zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras @481a *//🔽bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: de lta bas na la la zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras @481a *// bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: Therefore, if someone wishes to abide in the result of stream enterer

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: and wishes to actualize the result of stream enterer,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
translated: he should not fail to rely on this acceptance.

original: la la zhig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: la la zhig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: Some wish to abide in the result of once-returner,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: and although they wish to actualize the result of once-returner,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brtan du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brtan du mi rung ngo //
translated: they should not be unstable in this acceptance.

original: la la zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: la la zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: Some wish to abide in the result of non-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: and although they wish to actualize the result of non-returner,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //🔽la la zhig dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo // la la zhig dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: they should not be unstable in this acceptance.🔽Some wish to abide in the state of an arhat,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: and although they wish to actualize the state of an arhat,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //🔽la la zhig rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo // la la zhig rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: they should not be unstable in this acceptance.🔽Some wish to abide in the state of a pratyekabuddha,

original: rang byang chub mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: and although they wish to actualize the state of a pratyekabuddha,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
translated: they should not be unstable in this acceptance.

original: la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod cing /
analyzed: la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod cing /
translated: Some wish to abide in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du bya bar 'dod na'ang /
translated: If you wish to manifest unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment,

original: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa 'di la mi brten du mi rung ngo //
translated: you should rely on this patience.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine sons,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas brjod pa dang / mnyan du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas brjod pa dang / mnyan du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: in this way, bodhisattva mahāsattvas should abide in the perfection of wisdom from the first generation of the mind of awakening onward, because it is inexpressible and cannot be heard.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu bzhi @481b pa'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu bzhi @481b pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the fourteenth chapter of the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines, the chapter on the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po brgya gnyis pa //
analyzed: bam po brgya gnyis pa //
translated: Chapter 102

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
translated: Then the divine sons had this thought:

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor la chos nyan pa rnam pa ji lta bu dag btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor la chos nyan pa rnam pa ji lta bu dag btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti, having understood in his own mind the thoughts occurring to those gods,

original: lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to those gods:

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Gods,

original: bdag gis chos bstan pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: bdag gis chos bstan pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: the Dharma teaching I give is like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Gods,

original: bdag la chos nyan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag la chos nyan pa'ang sgyu ma lta bur btsal bar bya'o //
translated: you should seek Dharma-hearers who are like an illusion for me.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Gods,

original: bdag gis chos bstan pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: bdag gis chos bstan pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: the Dharma teaching I give is like a magical creation.

original: bdag la chos nyan pa'ang sprul pa lta bur bcal bar bya ste /
analyzed: bdag la chos nyan pa'ang sprul pa lta bur bcal bar bya ste /
translated: You should seek Dharma-hearers who are like a magical creation for me.

original: de dag ni ci'ang nyan pa med cing /
analyzed: de dag ni ci'ang nyan pa med cing /
translated: They do not hear anything at all,

original: ci'ang mngon du byed pa med do //
analyzed: ci'ang mngon du byed pa med do //
translated: and they do not actualize anything at all.”

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then those gods said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: “Divine princes, do you think that those sentient beings are like an illusion,

original: chos nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin nam /
analyzed: chos nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin nam /
translated: and that those who listen to the Dharma are like an illusion?

original: sems can de dag sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: Do you think that those sentient beings are like a magical creation,

original: chos nyan pa de dag sprul pa lta bu yin nam /
analyzed: chos nyan pa de dag sprul pa lta bu yin nam /
translated: and that those who listen to the Dharma are like a magical creation?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: lha'i bu / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Divine princes, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: Those sentient beings are like an illusion,

original: chos nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: and those who listen to the Dharma are like an illusion.

original: sems can de dag ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag ni sprul pa lta bu ste /
translated: Those sentient beings are like a magical creation,

original: chos nyan pa de dag sprul pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos nyan pa de dag sprul pa lta bu'o //
translated: and those who listen to the Dharma are like a magical creation.”

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
translated: those sentient beings are like a dream.

original: lha'i bu dag //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag //
translated: Divine princes,

original: sems @482a *// can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems @482a *// can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: those sentient beings are like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: form is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: feeling is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: 'du shes kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: perception is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽'du byed kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / 'du byed kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of form?

original: rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // lha'i bu dag /
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness?

original: mig kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽rna ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // rna ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of the eyes?

original: sna'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽lce'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽lus kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽yid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: sna'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // lce'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // lus kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // yid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind?

original: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sgra'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽dri'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sgra'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // dri'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of a form?🔽The gods said, What is the nature of a sound, a smell, a taste, a feeling, and a dharma?

original: ro'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽reg kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: ro'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // reg kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of the eye constituent?🔽The gods said, What is the nature of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind constituents?🔽The gods said, What is the nature of the form constituent?

original: chos kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gods said, What is the nature of the sound, smell, taste, feeling, and dharma constituents?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Ear consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Nose consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Tongue consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Body consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Mind consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Eye contact is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te @482b reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te @482b reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Ear contact is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Nose contact is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Tongue contact is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Body contact is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Mental contact is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Feelings that arise from the condition of eye contact are like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Feelings that arise from the condition of ear contact are like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Feelings that arise from the condition of nose contact are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Feelings that arise from the condition of tongue contact are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Feelings that arise from the condition of body contact are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Feelings that arise from the condition of thinking-mind contact are like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The earth element is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: chu'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The water element is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: me'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽rlung gi khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: me'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // rlung gi khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: the fire element is like a dream, like an illusion;🔽the wind element is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: the space element is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: the consciousness element is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: ma rig pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Ignorance is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: 'du byed kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: volitional actions are like a dream, like an illusion;

original: rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
translated: consciousness is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: ming dang gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: name and form are like a dream, like an illusion;

original: skye mched drug kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: the six sense spheres are like a dream, like an illusion;

original: @483a *// reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: @483a *// reg pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: contact is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽sred pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // sred pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: feeling is like a dream, like an illusion;🔽craving is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: len pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: len pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: clinging is like a dream, like an illusion;

original: srid pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: srid pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Existence is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: skye ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: skye ba'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Birth is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rga shi'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rga shi'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Old age and death are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The perfection of patience is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Inner emptiness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Outer emptiness is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal phenomena is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: @483b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: @483b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-discarded phenomena is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The right efforts are also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The bases of supernatural power are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: dbang po rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The faculties are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: stobs rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The powers are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The factors of awakening are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The noble eightfold path is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The noble truths are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The immeasurables are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The formless meditative stabilizations are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The liberations are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta @484a *//
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta @484a *//
translated: The serial absorptions are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: bu'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: bu'o // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The gateways to liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The superknowledges are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The meditative stabilities are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The fearlessnesses are also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽byams pa chen po'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // byams pa chen po'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are also like a dream, like an illusion.🔽Great love is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: snying rje chen po'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Great compassion is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The eighteen distinctive qualities of the buddhas are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
translated: The result of stream enterer is like a dream, like an illusion.🔽The result of once-returner is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The result of non-returner is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: The state of a worthy one is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rang byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: A pratyekabuddha’s awakening is like a dream, like an illusion.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Sons of gods,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: perfect buddhahood is like a dream, like an illusion.”

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the gods said to venerable Subhūti,

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable monk Subhūti,

original: byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur bshad na /
analyzed: byang chub kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur bshad na /
translated: if you say that awakening is like a dream, like an illusion,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu @484b sgyu ma lta bur bshad dam /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu @484b sgyu ma lta bur bshad dam /
translated: “Is nirvana also explained as being like a dream, like an illusion?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: “Divine princes,

original: bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra ste /
analyzed: bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra ste /
translated: I say that nirvana is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de lta bas na gal te mya ngan las 'das pa de las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod na'ang /
analyzed: de lta bas na gal te mya ngan las 'das pa de las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod na'ang /
translated: Therefore, if there were any other phenomenon that was superior to nirvana,

original: de la bdag ni rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra'o //
analyzed: de la bdag ni rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur smra'o //
translated: I would say that it is also like a dream, like an illusion.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Divine princes,

original: de ni 'di ltar rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / mya ngan las 'das pa de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / mya ngan las 'das pa de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: it is because a dream, an illusion, and nirvana are not two, nor are they divided.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzod ldan chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu dang /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mdzod ldan chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka tya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu dang /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra, the venerable Mahā­maudgalyāyana, the venerable Mahā­kauṣṭhila, the venerable Mahā­kātyāyana, the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaṇī­putra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du mas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //🔽btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du mas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so // btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: the venerable Mahā­kāśyapa, and many thousands of bodhisattvas said to the venerable Su­bhūti, “Venerable Su­bhūti,🔽who will have confidence in this perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
translated: which is so profound,

original: 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
translated: which is so difficult to see,

original: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: which is so difficult to realize,

original: 'di ltar zhi ba /🔽'di ltar gsal ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhi ba / 'di ltar gsal ba /
translated: which is so peaceful,🔽which is so sublime,

original: 'di ltar phra ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar phra ba /
translated: which is so subtle,

original: 'di ltar bzang ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar bzang ba /
translated: which is so excellent,

original: 'di la su dag yid ches par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di la su dag yid ches par 'gyur /
translated: and which is so hard to comprehend?”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to those great disciples and to those bodhisattva great beings,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag /
translated: “Venerable friends,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
translated: the irreversible bodhisattva great beings have confidence in this perfection of wisdom, which is so deep,🔽which is so hard to see,

original: @485a *// 'di ltar brtag dka' ba /🔽'di ltar brtag pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa /🔽'di ltar phra ba /
analyzed: @485a *// 'di ltar brtag dka' ba / 'di ltar brtag pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa / 'di ltar phra ba /
translated: which is so hard to realize,🔽which is so subtle,

original: 'di ltar gsal ba /🔽'di ltar blta dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal ba / 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
translated: which is so pellucid,

original: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: which is so hard to fathom,

original: 'di ltar zhi ba /🔽'di ltar bzang ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhi ba / 'di ltar bzang ba /
translated: which is so peaceful,🔽which is so excellent,

original: 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: which is so sublime,

original: 'di ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: which is to be known by the wise and the intelligent.

original: bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gam /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba'i gang zag gam /
translated: It is the person who has seen the truths,

original: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
translated: or the worthy one whose defilements have ceased, whose intentions are fulfilled,🔽or the pratyekabuddha,🔽or the bodhisattva great being who has confidence in this perfection of wisdom, which is so deep,🔽which is so hard to see,🔽which is so hard to realize,🔽which is so subtle,🔽which is so pellucid,🔽which is so hard to fathom,🔽which is so peaceful,🔽which is so excellent,🔽which is so sublime,🔽which is to be known by the wise and the intelligent.

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa dag dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa dag dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
translated: “Those beings who have served the victors of the past, who have repeatedly planted roots of virtue under many millions of buddhas, and those sons and daughters of noble family who are supported by spiritual teachers will have confidence in this perfection of wisdom, which is so profound,

original: 'di ltar brtag dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar brtag dka' ba /
translated: which is so difficult to investigate,

original: 'di ltar brtag pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar brtag pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
translated: which is not an object of investigation,

original: 'di ltar phra ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar phra ba /
translated: which is so subtle,

original: 'di ltar gsal ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal ba /
translated: which is so clear,

original: 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar blta dka' ba /
translated: which is so difficult to see,

original: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: which is so difficult to understand,

original: 'di ltar zhi ba /🔽'di ltar bzang ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhi ba / 'di ltar bzang ba /
translated: which is so peaceful,🔽which is so excellent,

original: 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: which is so exalted,

original: 'di ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ba de dag ni /🔽gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ba de dag ni / gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
translated: which is to be known by the wise and the learned.🔽They will not conceptualize that form is empty.

original: stong pa nyid gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not conceptualize that emptiness is form.

original: tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur /
